segments.text: This scene is making me quite anxious, honestly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy on the stool is in real danger of falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The legs are splayed, it looks so unstable beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the floor is getting slicker by the minute with all that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, he could seriously hurt himself or break the plate he's holding.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's incredibly frustrating that the adult is completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't she hear the running water or the splashing?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could reach in and stop the faucet myself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to intervene before a real accident happens here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This isn't just minor mischief; it has serious potential for injury.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the calm garden outside is almost mocking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't look away, but I dread what's coming next.
segments.speaker: PAR
